attributes.action: Democracy rules that 17,410,742 votes must be honoured . I support our PM Brexit
attributes.background: The people voted but the MPs have failed to represent their constituents. This Prime Minister is the only one trying to honour the vote of the people. You can’t have a PM who by his actions closes down parliament and democracy said Gina Miller. But your happy to deny democracy to the 17.4million

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You might like to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/257347
